Package de.teamLocster.Friends

Class FriendList

java.lang.Object
de.teamLocster.Friends.FriendList
public class FriendList
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FriendList()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void acceptFriendRequest​(FriendRequest friendRequest, User executingUser)
    Calls methods to add entries in 'acceptedFriends' to both users in the 'friendRequest', calls methods to remove entries in 'waitingFriends' from both users in the 'friendRequest', calls methods to update 'latestFriend' and 'oldestFriend' from both users
    void denyFriendRequest​(FriendRequest friendRequest)
    Calls methods to remove entries in 'waitingFriends' from both users in the 'friendRequest'
    java.util.ArrayList<FriendListItem> getAcceptedFriends()  
    FriendListItem getAcceptedFriendWithIndex​(int index)  
    java.util.ArrayList<FriendRequest> getWaitingFriends()  
    FriendRequest getWaitingFriendWithIndex​(int index)  
    void removeFriend​(FriendListItem friendListItem, User executingUser)
    Calls methods to remove entries in 'acceptedFriends' from both users in the 'friendlistItem' and updates latestFriend and oldestFriend in ProfileStatistics, calls methods to update 'latestFriend' and 'oldestFriend' from both users
    void sendFriendRequest​(User receiver, User sender)
    Calls methods to add entries in 'waitingFriends' to both the sender and receiver, throws Exceptions if sender == receiver or if validation fails
    void setAcceptedFriends​(java.util.ArrayList<FriendListItem> acceptedFriends)  
    void setWaitingFriends​(java.util.ArrayList<FriendRequest> waitingFriends)

  • Constructor Details

    • FriendList

      public FriendList()

  • Method Details

    • sendFriendRequest

      public void sendFriendRequest​(User receiver, User sender) throws CannotSendFriendRequestException
      Calls methods to add entries in 'waitingFriends' to both the sender and receiver, throws Exceptions if sender == receiver or if validation fails
      Parameters:
      receiver - == receiving user
      sender - == sending user
      Throws:
      CannotSendFriendRequestException

    • removeFriend

      public void removeFriend​(FriendListItem friendListItem, User executingUser)
      Calls methods to remove entries in 'acceptedFriends' from both users in the 'friendlistItem' and updates latestFriend and oldestFriend in ProfileStatistics, calls methods to update 'latestFriend' and 'oldestFriend' from both users
      Parameters:
      friendListItem - == to be removed entry
      executingUser - == calling user

    • acceptFriendRequest

      public void acceptFriendRequest​(FriendRequest friendRequest, User executingUser) throws CannotAcceptFriendRequestException
      Calls methods to add entries in 'acceptedFriends' to both users in the 'friendRequest', calls methods to remove entries in 'waitingFriends' from both users in the 'friendRequest', calls methods to update 'latestFriend' and 'oldestFriend' from both users
      Parameters:
      friendRequest - == to be accepted and removed friend request
      executingUser - == calling user
      Throws:
      CannotAcceptFriendRequestException

    • denyFriendRequest

      public void denyFriendRequest​(FriendRequest friendRequest)
      Calls methods to remove entries in 'waitingFriends' from both users in the 'friendRequest'
      Parameters:
      friendRequest - == to be removed friend request

      public java.util.ArrayList<FriendListItem> getAcceptedFriends()

      public FriendListItem getAcceptedFriendWithIndex​(int index)

    • setAcceptedFriends

      public void setAcceptedFriends​(java.util.ArrayList<FriendListItem> acceptedFriends)

      public java.util.ArrayList<FriendRequest> getWaitingFriends()

      public FriendRequest getWaitingFriendWithIndex​(int index)
